Body:
g2 = nngt.Graph()
attributes = {'size': 2.0, 'color': 'blue', 'a': 5, 'blob': []}
attribute_types = {'size': 'double', 'color': 'string', 'a': 'int', 'blob':
    'object'}
g2.new_node(attributes=attributes, value_types=attribute_types)
g2.new_node(2)
g2.new_node(3, attributes={'size': [4.0, 5.0, 1.0], 'color': ['r', 'g', 'b'
    ]}, value_types={'size': 'double', 'color': 'string'})
double_res = np.array([2.0, np.NaN, np.NaN, 4.0, 5.0, 1.0])
isnan1 = np.isnan(g2.node_attributes['size'])
isnan2 = np.isnan(double_res)
self.assertTrue(np.all(isnan1 == isnan2))
self.assertTrue(np.all(np.isclose(g2.node_attributes['size'][~isnan1],
    double_res[~isnan2])))
self.assertEqual(g2.node_attributes['color'].tolist(), ['blue', '', '', 'r',
    'g', 'b'])
self.assertEqual(g2.node_attributes['a'].tolist(), [5, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0])
self.assertEqual(g2.node_attributes['blob'].tolist(), [[], None, None, None,
    None, None])
